content:
Craft an item of type: white_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 4, "index": 21}, {"type": "fermented_spider_eye", "quantity": 11, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_concrete_powder", "quantity": 5, "index": 27}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 8, "index": 37}, {"type": "diamond_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft white_wool, I need to place string in a 2x2 pattern on the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move one string from slot 21 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: white_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 3, "index": 21}, {"type": "fermented_spider_eye", "quantity": 11, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_concrete_powder", "quantity": 5, "index": 27}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 8, "index": 37}, {"type": "diamond_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Since I have placed one string in slot 1, I now need to place another string to the right of it. Therefore, I will move another string from slot 21 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: white_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 2, "index": 21}, {"type": "fermented_spider_eye", "quantity": 11, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_concrete_powder", "quantity": 5, "index": 27}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 8, "index": 37}, {"type": "diamond_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Since I have placed two strings in the top row of the crafting grid, I now need to place two more strings in the bottom row. Therefore, I will move another string from slot 21 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: white_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "fermented_spider_eye", "quantity": 11, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_concrete_powder", "quantity": 5, "index": 27}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 8, "index": 37}, {"type": "diamond_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Since I have placed one string in slot 4, I now need to place another string to the right of it. Therefore, I will move another string from slot 21 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: white_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "fermented_spider_eye", "quantity": 11, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_concrete_powder", "quantity": 5, "index": 27}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 8, "index": 37}, {"type": "diamond_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: Since I have placed all four strings in the crafting grid, I can now craft the white_wool. Therefore, I will move the crafted white_wool from slot 0 to an empty slot in my inventory (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
